backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no backend logic.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence metadata describing implemented Valentine prompt UI, evasive No button, celebratory meme, and theme.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: High‑level descriptions of key frontend components and theme configuration.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base theme with OKLCH variables for UI styling and dark mode support.
frontend/index.html: Root HTML page loading the React app via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Minimal wrapper rendering ValentinePrompt centered in the viewport.
Interactive Valentine prompt with evasive No button logic, Yes‑click celebration state, and meme display.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook creating and refreshing a backend actor instance tied to Internet Identity state.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context and provider managing Internet Identity login, stored identities, and auth client lifecycle.
frontend/src/index.css: Frontend’s romantic pink‑white theme with OKLCH variables, gradients, and custom utility classes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App bootstrap setting up React, InternetIdentityProvider, react‑query, and global styles.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining dark mode, content paths, extended color system using OKLCH variables, custom animations, and plugins like typography and container queries.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing an interactive Valentine webpage with an evasive No button, a Yes-triggered meme image, and a pink/white romantic theme for iPad Chrome.
